CopyNo.Description: This function gives the current Copy Number.
CopyNo.Name: CopyNo

InDMPMode.Description: This function returns TRUE if the printing mode selected is DMP Mode (Dot Matrix Printing) else returns FALSE.
InDMPMode.Name: InDMPMode

InDraftMode.Description: This function returns TRUE if the printing mode selected is Quick/Draft Mode else returns FALSE.
InDraftMode.Name: InDraftMode

InPixelMode.Description: This function returns TRUE if the printing mode selected is Neat Mode else returns FALSE.
InPixelMode.Name: InPixelMode

InPreviewMode.Description: This function returns TRUE only if a report is being generated for showing Preview.
InPreviewMode.Name: InPreviewMode

InPrintMode.Description: This function returns TRUE only if a particular report is accessed through a Menu/Button/Key with Print action else returns FALSE.
InPrintMode.Name: InPrintMode

IsMultiPagePrintJob.Description: This function returns TRUE if printing spans across multiple pages i.e., more than one page else returns FALSE.
IsMultiPagePrintJob.Name: IsMultiPagePrintJob

IsMultiPartPrintJob.Description: This function returns TRUE if the number of columns being printed spans across multiple pages else returns FALSE.
IsMultiPartPrintJob.Name: IsMultiPartPrintJob

NatLangInfo.Description: This function is used to retrieve information from current Natural Language query being executed.

Parameters.Keywords: Company, From Date, Object FullName, Object Name, Object Type, SecondaryObject Name, SecondaryObject Type, To Date, Username

NatLangInfo.Name: NatLangInfo

OriginalNo.Description: This function returns the Number of the current Form being printed within the current Report.
OriginalNo.Name: OriginalNo

PageNo.Description: This function returns the current page number being printed.
PageNo.Name: PageNo

PageRangeOk.Description: This function returns the page range specified.
PageRangeOk.Name: PageRangeOk

PaperSizeInInches.Description: This function returns the page size in inches calculated based on the selected printer which is the parameter to this function.
PaperSizeInInches.Name: PaperSizeInInches

PaperSizeInLines.Description: This function returns the page size in number of lines and columns calculated based on the selected printer which is the parameter to this function.
PaperSizeInLines.Name: PaperSizeInLines

PaperSizeInMM.Description: This function returns the page size in Millimeters calculated based on the selected printer which is the parameter to this function.
PaperSizeInMM.Name: PaperSizeInMM

PaperType.Description: This function returns the type of the paper based on the selected printer which is the parameter to this function.
PaperType.Name: PaperType

PartNo.Description: Thif function returns the Page Number if the Columns being printed spans across multiple pages.  The Page No is being assigned as Page 1(A), Page 1(B), Page 2(A), Page 2(B), etc.
PartNo.Name: PartNo

PortName.Description: This function returns the Port name of the selected printer if Printer Name is supplied as a parameter. In absence of any parameters, it returns the Port Name of the first printer in the list of installed printers.
PortName.Name: PortName

PrintBottomClip.Description: This function sets the default Space Bottom for the current page for the selected printer which is the parameter.
PrintBottomClip.Name: PrintBottomClip

PrinterInfo.Description: This function is used to retrieve printer related information.

Parameters.Keywords: BottomMarginInMMs, LeftMarginInMMs, Orientation, PaperSizeInInches, PaperSizeInLines, PaperSizeInMMs, PaperType, PortName, PrinterExists, PrinterSizeInInches, PrinterSizeInMMs, PrinterType, PrintSizeInInches, PrintSizeInLines, PrintSizeInMMs, RIghtMarginInMMs, Status, TopMarginInMMs

PrinterInfo.Name: PrinterInfo

PrintersExist.Description: The function returns TRUE if printer is installed on the System else returns FALSE.
PrintersExist.Name: PrintersExist

PrintLeftClip.Description: This function sets the default Space Left for the current page for the selected printer which is the parameter.
PrintLeftClip.Name: PrintLeftClip

PrintRightClip.Description: This function sets the default Space Right for the current page for the selected printer which is the parameter.
PrintRightClip.Name: PrintRightClip

PrintSizeInInches.Description: This function returns the page size in inches calculated based on the selected printer which is the parameter to this function.
PrintSizeInInches.Name: PrintSizeInInches

PrintSizeInMM.Description: This function returns the page size in Millimeters calculated based on the selected printer which is the parameter to this function.
PrintSizeInMM.Name: PrintSizeInMM

PrintTopClip.Description: This function sets the default Space Top for the current page for the selected printer which is the parameter.
PrintTopClip.Name: PrintTopClip

SetNo.Description: This function gives the current Set Number.
SetNo.Name: SetNo
